metadataProvider.organizationName: I. I. Schmalhausen Institute of Zoology NAS of Ukraine

associatedParty.organizationName: I. I. Schmalhausen Institute of Zoology NAS of Ukraine

dataset.abstract: The dataset is prepared by Ukrainian Nature conservation group in collaboration with Institute of Botany and Institute of zoology NAS Ukraine a part of the UNEP project ‘Building national biodiversity information supply and demand in Pan Europe to support implementation & progress review of the post-2020 global biodiversity framework' funded by the European Commission and technically supported the UN Environment Programme World Conservation Monitoring Centre (UNEP-WCMC). Coordinator of the Ukrainian part of the project is Dr. V. Kostiushyn. In order to collect information about the records of alien (primarily invasive) species of plants, animals and fungi in Ukraine, the NGO Ukrainian Nature Conservation Group (UNCG), in cooperation with the M. H. Kholodny Institute of Botany of National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine and I.I. Schmalhausen Institute of Zoology of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine, announced in 2022 the publication of a special collection. In Ukraine, this approach works well, because publishing the publication allows to encourage many authors who have not worked with the GBIF format before. It was the materials of the specially designed collection "Records of alien species of plants and animals in Ukraine" that made up the data array of this dataset. It should be emphasized that the task set before the authors was quite difficult, because at this time there is no official list of invasive or alien species in Ukraine. Moreover, some of these species have been present on the territory of Ukraine for many decades, and in some cases for several hundreds of years. Also, the scale of distribution of such species in Ukraine is very significant and the data set about them can never be complete. Information for this set was provided by 164 specialists from 56 scientific institutions and organizations of Ukraine.

intellectualRights.para: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (CC-BY) 4.0 License.

geographicCoverage.geographicDescription: The dataset covers entire territory of Ukraine.

taxonomicCoverage.generalTaxonomicCoverage: The dataset consists of records of plants, animals and fungi that are alien to ukrainian territory., The dataset consists of records of plants, animals and fungi that are alien to ukrainian territory.

contact.organizationName: I. I. Schmalhausen Institute of Zoology NAS of Ukraine

description.para: Preparation of research articles using unified template by authors.
Data aggregation and preparation for publishing as paper book.
Data cleaning and alignment to Darwin Core standards.

Data were collected, georeferenced, and organized by the authors of each article on their own. Additional data cleaning and postprocessing were conducted by Marina Burlaka, Valeriia Konaikova, Anna Kuzemko, Olexiy Vasyliuk, Vitalii Kavurka, Mikhail Rusin, Oksana Nekrasova, Ihor Balashov, Iuliia Kutsokon and Oleksii Marushchak.

samplingDescription.para: Data were collected, georeferenced, and organized by the authors of each articles on their own. Additional data cleaning and postprocessing were conducted by Oleksii Marushchak.

description.para: Authors of each particular article are fully responsible for the correctness of species identifications, information on organisms' quantity and georeferencing. Sporadic issues in georeferencing, revealed during data cleaning, were corrected where it was possible, by Oleksii Marushchak.
